Texts.Chs:
尽管它们确实有一对翅膀和一个角，但它们...还没有统治世界。

食性: ^green;草食性^reset;

^orange;天赋^reset;:
  皇家人物: +^green;10^reset;% 魅力, 让市场上的产品更便宜。
  HPx^green;1.05^reset;
   能量x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% 能量恢复
  坠落伤害 x^green;0.4^reset;
抗性:  +^green;45^reset;% 射线抗性
 
^orange;环境^reset;:
 
  花园/丛林/原始森林/森林/草原生物群落:
     能量x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% 速度 & 跳跃, +^green;10^reset;%物理抗性, 加成与其他小马分享。
  外星/血肉生物群落:
     能量x^red;0.9^reset;, HPx^red;0.85^reset;, -^red;15^reset;%能量回复
  寒带或热带生物群落:
    HPx^red;0.9^reset;, -^red;12^reset;% 速度 & 跳跃,  -^red;30^reset;% 能量恢复。与企鹅和changelings一起共享。
 
^orange;武器^reset;:

  法杖: 伤害 x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;1.5^reset;% 暴击几率
  投掷武器: +^green;6^reset;% 速度
  磁力珠: +^green;15^reset;% 暴击伤害
  火箭发射器: 伤害 x^green;1.12^reset;, -^red;40^reset;%击退抗性

^red;弱点^reset;:
  抗性:  -^red;5^reset;% 暗影抗性, -^red;15^reset;%辐射抗性, -^red;25^reset;%物理抗性, -^red;30^reset;%电系抗性
  代谢亢进: +^red;30^reset;%饥饿速率
Texts.Eng:
While they do have a pair of wings and a horn they don't rule the world... yet.

Diet: ^green;Herbivore^reset;

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Royal figure: +^green;10^reset;% Charisma, leading to cheaper products in the markets.
  Health x^green;1.05^reset;
  Energy x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Energy Regeneration
  Fall Damage x^green;0.4^reset;
Resist: +^green;45^reset;% Cosmic
 
^orange;Environment^reset;:
 
  In Garden, Jungle, Primeval, Forest and Savannah biomes:
    Energy x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Speed & Jump and +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resist, the bonus is shared with other ponies.
  Alien or fleshy biomes:
    Energy x^red;0.9^reset;, Health x^red;0.85^reset;, -^red;15^reset;% E. Regen
  In cold or hot biomes:
    Health x^red;0.9^reset;, -^red;12^reset;% speed & jump, and -^red;30^reset;% Energy Regeneration. Shared with pegasi and changelings.
 
^orange;Weapons^reset;:

  Staves: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;1.5^reset;% Crit Chance
  Thrown: +^green;6^reset;% Speed
  Magnorbs: +^green;15^reset;% Critical Damage
  Rocket Launchers: Damage x^green;1.12^reset;, -^red;40^reset;% Knockback resistance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Resist: -^red;5^reset;% Shadow, -^red;15^reset;% Radiation, -^red;25^reset;% Physical, -^red;30^reset;% Electricity
  Hyperactive metabolism: +^red;30^reset;% Hunger Rate
